text: Emlain Kabua (born February 1928 – 11 April 2023)Profile of Emlain Kudo Kabua was a Marshallese artist and political figure. She was the First Lady of the Marshall Islands and the wife of Marshallese President Amata Kabua. Kabua served as the first First Lady of the Marshall Islands from 1979 until 1996. She is known for being the designer of the Flag of the Marshall Islands. Kabua died on 11 April 2023, at the age of 95.活動剪影 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Marshallese people Category:Artists
title: Emlain Kabua
